participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Avery is creative and adventurous, always looking for new experiences. She has a passion for animals, particularly horses, and enjoys expressing herself through her colorful room decor.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is fun-loving and nostalgic, with a great appreciation for music from her youth. She enjoys dancing and keeps an active lifestyle, always ready to share her favorites from the past.
participant_2.background: i take dance lessons once a week. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.
